item.title: Lime bikes consistently parked outside of allocated space - blocking access to parking and road, 30th August
item.description:
Lime bikes and scooters consistently parked outside of allocated space - blocking access to parking and road. Users of bikes come from E&C tube / roundabout - could additional provision not be made for bike parking there?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oswin Street, Elephant and Castle, London

item.title: Dog Fouling problem still there, 30th August
item.description:
Residents between Wellington Rd to Great elms rd keeping drop their dog poo some with poo bags and some even without poo bags Just kindly will you be able to put the pick up poo sign at the street or put on the lamp post to remind the residents to keep the area clean please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Elms Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
